00029 // Standard values taken from PDB
00030 
00031 double hbc = 197.327053;
00032 double mproton = 938.27231/197.327053;  
00033 double mneutron = 939.56563/197.327053; 
00034 double mnucleon = 0.5*(938.27231+939.56563)/197.327053; 
00035 double alpha = 1/137.0359895;           
00036 
00037 double r2proton = 0.801025;     // Rp = 0.895(18) fm, I. Sick, PLB 576 (2003) 62
00038 double r2neutron = -0.120;      // Rn^2 = -0.120(5) fm^2, S. Kopecky, PRC 56 (1997) 2229
00039 
00040 double rho0 = 0.17;
00041 
00042 double muproton = 2.792847337;
00043 double muneutron = -1.9130427;
00044 
00045 double gagv = -1.2695;           // -1.2695 \pm 0.0029

00048 char* nucleusname(int A, int Z)
00049 {
00050   char* name = malloc(5*sizeof(char));
00051   sprintf(name, "%s%d", ElementName[Z], A);
00052   
00053   return name;
00054 }
00055 
00056 
00057 double r2charge(double r2p, int N, int Z)
00058 {
00059   return (r2p + r2proton + 1.0*N/Z*r2neutron);
00060 }
00061

00063 // proton and neutron formfactor taken from 
00064 // Z. Phys. A - Atomic Nuclei 323, 13-25 (1986)
00065 
00066 /*
00067 double fproton(double q)
00068 {
00069   const double a[4] = { 0.312, 1.312, -0.709, 0.085};
00070   const double b[4] = { 0.16667, 0.06658, 0.02269, 0.006485};
00071   double f = 0.0;
00072   int i;
00073 
00074   for (i=0; i<4; i++)
00075     f += a[i]/(1+b[i]*q*q);
00076 
00077   return f;
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 double fneutron(double q)
00082 {
00083   const double a[2] = { 1, -1};
00084   const double b[2] = { 0.04833, 0.05833};
00085   double f = 0.0;
00086   int i;
00087 
00088   for (i=0; i<2; i++)
00089     f += a[i]/(1+b[i]*q*q);
00090 
00091   return f;
00092 }
00093 */
00094 
00095 // proton and neutron formfactor taken from
00096 // Friedrich, Walcher, Eur. Phys. J. A 17 607-623 (2003)
00097 // phenomenological Fit, Table 2
00098 
00099 #define SQR(x) ((x)*(x))
00100 
00101 double fproton(double q)
00102 {
00103   double a10 = 1.041, a11 = 0.765*SQR(1000/hbc);
00104   double a20 = -0.041, a21 = 6.2*SQR(1000/hbc);
00105   double ab = -0.23/SQR(1000/hbc), Qb = 0.07*(1000/hbc), 
00106     sigb = 0.27*(1000/hbc);
00107 
00108   return (a10/SQR(1+SQR(q)/a11) + a20/(SQR(1+SQR(q)/a21)) +
00109           ab*SQR(q)*(exp(-0.5*SQR((q-Qb)/sigb))+exp(-0.5*SQR((q+Qb)/sigb))));
00110 }
00111 
00112 double fneutron(double q)
00113 {
00114   double a10 = 1.04, a11 = 1.73*SQR(1000/hbc);
00115   double a20 = -1.04, a21 = 1.54*SQR(1000/hbc);
00116   double ab = 0.23/SQR(1000/hbc), Qb = 0.29*(1000/hbc), 
00117     sigb = 0.20*(1000/hbc);
00118 
00119   return (a10/SQR(1+SQR(q)/a11) + a20/(SQR(1+SQR(q)/a21)) +
00120           ab*SQR(q)*(exp(-0.5*SQR((q-Qb)/sigb))+exp(-0.5*SQR((q+Qb)/sigb))));
00121 }
